data.eml:eml: Three new species and a new combination in the genus Omaliopsis Jeannel, 1940 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae: Omaliini) of China and Nepal

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V. (2019): Three new species and a new combination in the genus Omaliopsis Jeannel, 1940 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae: Omaliini) of China and Nepal. Zootaxa 4603 (2): 354-364, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4603.2.8
